overview: In upscale Opulent, Arizona, Jason Miller, mid-20s, a spoiled rich kid still living off daddy's money, and his wrong-side-of-the-tracks friend, Rick Brooks, raised in poverty, naively choose the wrong path to riches. Their fast-cash plan crashes them into a brick wall when they unwittingly cross into the territory of the dark and deadly crime lords that rule the underworld of Opulent.
title: The Dark Side of Opulent
